header.title: Advanced BBCode Box 3 (aka ABBC3) Add-on : Compact View.
header.description:
This file provides instructions to change the ABBC3 behaviour and get a compact view.
See the main install file for any additional information about the MOD.
header.author-notes:
To read more about ABBC3, please read the contrib/docs/README.HTML file
------------------------------------------------------------------- NOTE: This addition is optional - is display ABBC3 in "Compact View" instead "Full View"
Compact View means all bbcodes will be displayed as a list To see the result compare screenshots : root/contrib/screenshots/Prosilver_posting_default.gif against root/contrib/screenshots/Prosilver_posting_compactview.gif or root/contrib/screenshots/Subsilver2_posting_default.gif against root/contrib/screenshots/Subsilver2_posting_compactview.gif
------------------------------------------------------------------- Also you can find usefully the "Custom Profile Fields" add-on please read the contrib/add-on_MSSTI_ABBC3_Custom_Profile_Fields.xml

action-group.diy-instructions:
IMPORTANT !
##################################################################### A) Log on to Administration Control Panel
##################################################################### B) Purge the cache :
B.1) Navigate to General Tab B.2) look at Purge the cache B.3) Click on "Run Now" button at right B.4) in the next screen, click on "Yes"
